data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Szawaryn, Karol, Tomaszewska, Wioletta (2014): A contribution to Macrolasia Weise (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae: Epilachnini). Zootaxa 3780 (3): 577-584, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3780.3.9
